vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.12;
son of: Gemalli (H1582)
§ Ammiel = "my kinsman is God"
1) the spy from the tribe of Dan who perished in the plague for his evil report
2) father of Machir of Lo-debar
3) father of Bathsheba; also 'Eliam'
4) the 6th son of Obed-edom and doorkeeper of the temple
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Guemalí; espía; tribu de Dan; (b)   padre de Maquir, de Lodebar; (c) אֱלִיעָם   padre de Betsabé, esposa de Urías, David; (d)   hijo de Obed-edom; portero; en tiempos de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞米利 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "神是我的親屬"
1) 由但支派選出去查探應許之地的探子, 因其回報打擊弓民眾對神的信心而遭瘟疫
暴斃 (民 13:12)
2) 羅底巴的瑪吉的父親 (撒下 9:4-5;17:27)
3) 拔示巴(代上 3:5|譯作 拔書亞)的父親; 又稱作 "以連" [0463]
4) 俄別以東的第六個兒子, 負責看守聖殿的門 (代上 26:5)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚米利 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "神是我的亲属"
1) 由但支派选出去查探应许之地的探子, 因其回报打击弓民众对神的信心而遭瘟疫
暴毙 (民 13:12)
2) 罗底巴的玛吉的父亲 (撒下 9:4-5;17:27)
3) 拔示巴(代上 3:5|译作 拔书亚)的父亲; 又称作 "以连" [0463]
4) 俄别以东的第六个儿子, 负责看守圣殿的门 (代上 26:5)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.9.4;
father of: Machir (H4353H)
§ Ammiel = "my kinsman is God"
1) the spy from the tribe of Dan who perished in the plague for his evil report
2) father of Machir of Lo-debar
3) father of Bathsheba; also 'Eliam'
4) the 6th son of Obed-edom and doorkeeper of the temple

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.5;
son of: Obed-edom (H5654);
brother of: Shemaiah (H8098I), Jehozabad (H3075H), Joah (H3098I), Sachar (H7940), Nethanel (H5417K), Issachar (H3485H) and Peullethai (H6469)
§ Ammiel = "my kinsman is God"
1) the spy from the tribe of Dan who perished in the plague for his evil report
2) father of Machir of Lo-debar
3) father of Bathsheba; also 'Eliam'
4) the 6th son of Obed-edom and doorkeeper of the temple

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.11.3;
father of: Bathsheba (H1339); also called Ammiel at 1Ch.3.5;
Another name of e.li.am (אֱלִיעָם "Eliam" H0463)
§ Ammiel = "my kinsman is God"
1) the spy from the tribe of Dan who perished in the plague for his evil report
2) father of Machir of Lo-debar
3) father of Bathsheba; also 'Eliam'
4) the 6th son of Obed-edom and doorkeeper of the temple
